mapper.insert: insert into resource( course_id, user_id, resource_name, resource_size, resource_filename, resource_address, resource_time, download_count ) values ( #{courseId} #{userId}, #{resourceName}, #{resourceSize}, #{resourceFilename}, #{resourceAddress}, #{resourceTime}, #{downloadCount} )
mapper.select: select resource.resource_id, resource.course_id, resource.user_id, resource.resource_name, resource.resource_size, resource.resource_filename, resource.resource_address, resource.resource_time, resource.download_count from resource, course where resource.course_id = course.course_id AND course.course_name = #{courseName}
mapper.update: update resource set resource_id=#{resourceId}, course_id=#{courseId}, user_id=#{userId}, resource_name=#{resourceName}, resource_size=#{resourceSize}, resource_filename=#{resourceFilename}, resource_address=#{resourceAddress}, resource_time=#{resourceTime}, download_count=#{downloadCount} where resource_id = #{resourceId}
